docs.snippet: After three quarterbacks made news in the first round of the N.F.L. draft, defensive players were a focus early in the second round....
docs.lead_paragraph: After three quarterbacks made news in the first round of the N.F.L. draft, defensive players were a focus early in the second round.
docs.abstract: Second round of the NFL draft is dominated early on by receivers and defensive players, though quarterback Derek Carr of Fresno State is picked first by the Oakland Raiders.

headline.main: Teams Build on Defense in 2nd Round of Draft
headline.print_headline: Receivers and Defense Are Second-Round Focus

docs.snippet: Jace Amaro, taken 49th, is the latest addition to a meager offense overhauled by the arrivals of Eric Decker, the top free-agent receiver, and the running back Chris Johnson....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jace Amaro, taken 49th, is the latest addition to a meager offense overhauled by the arrivals of Eric Decker, the top free-agent receiver, and the running back Chris Johnson.
docs.abstract: New York Jets pick safety Jace Amaro in second round of the NFL draft, rounding out an overhaul of their offense.

docs.snippet: In the second round of the N.F.L. draft, the Giants selected Weston Richburg, a durable, consistent four-year starter at Colorado State....
docs.lead_paragraph: In the second round of the N.F.L. draft, the Giants selected Weston Richburg, a durable, consistent four-year starter at Colorado State.
docs.abstract: New York Giants becomes first team in the NFL draft to select a center, selecting Weston Richburg with second-round pick; Richburg is a durable, consistent four-year starter from Colorado State.

headline.main: Giants Add a Center, the First Taken in the Draft
headline.print_headline: Giants Add a Center, the First Taken in the Draft

docs.snippet: Louisville safety Calvin Pryor, the 18th overall choice, has confidence, a reputation for aggressiveness and an unusual nickname....
docs.lead_paragraph: Louisville safety Calvin Pryor, the 18th overall choice, has confidence, a reputation for aggressiveness and an unusual nickname.
docs.abstract: Louisville safety Calvin Pryor, first pick by the New York Jets and 18th overall choice in the NFL draft, has confidence and a reputation for aggressiveness.

headline.main: Jets’ Top Pick, Once a Point Guard, Now Revels in His Physical Play

docs.snippet: Defensive end Michael Sam of the University of Missouri became the first openly gay player to be selected in a National Football League Draft when he was taken in the seventh round by the St. Louis Rams on Saturday....
